verses.verse: Now it came <S%H1961><s%> about when <S%H9201><s%> it was reported <S%H8085><s%> to Sanballat, <S%H5571><s%> Tobiah, <S%H2900><s%> to Geshem <S%H1654><s%> the Arab, <S%H6163><s%> and to the rest <S%H3499><s%> of our enemies <S%H340><s%> that I had rebuilt <S%H1129><s%> the wall, <S%H2346><s%> and [that] no <S%H3808><s%> breach <S%H6556><s%> remained <S%H3498><s%> in it, although <S%H1571><s%> at that time <S%H6256><s%> I had not set <S%H5975><s%> up the doors <S%H1817><s%> in the gates, <S%H8179><s%>

that Sanballat <S%H5571><s%> and Geshem <S%H1654><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> [a message] to me, saying, <S%H559><s%> "Come, <S%H1980><s%> let us meet <S%H3259><s%> together <S%H9191><s%> at Chephirim <S%H9215><s%> in the plain <S%H1237><s%> of Ono. <S%H207><s%>" But they were planning <S%H2803><s%> to harm <S%H9567><s%> me.

So I sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> to them, saying, <S%H559><s%> "I am doing <S%H6213><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> work <S%H4399><s%> and I cannot <S%H3201><s%> <S%H3808><s%> come <S%H3381><s%> down. <S%H3381><s%> Why <S%H4100><s%> should the work <S%H4399><s%> stop <S%H7673><s%> while <S%H9201><s%> I leave <S%H7503><s%> it and come <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to you?"

And they sent <S%H7971><s%> [messages] to me four <S%H702><s%> times <S%H6471><s%> in this <S%H2088><s%> manner, <S%H1697><s%> and I answered <S%H7725><s%> them in the same <S%H2088><s%> way. <S%H1697><s%>

Then Sanballat <S%H5571><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> his servant <S%H5288><s%> to me in the same <S%H2088><s%> manner <S%H1697><s%> a fifth <S%H2549><s%> time <S%H6471><s%> with an open <S%H6605><s%> letter <S%H107><s%> in his hand. <S%H3027><s%>

In it was written, <S%H3789><s%> "It is reported <S%H8085><s%> among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and Gashmu <S%H1654><s%> says, <S%H559><s%> that you and the Jews <S%H3064><s%> are planning <S%H2803><s%> to rebel; <S%H4775><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> you are rebuilding <S%H1129><s%> the wall. <S%H2346><s%> And you are to be their king, <S%H4428><s%> according to these <S%H428><s%> reports. <S%H1697><s%>

"And you have also <S%H1571><s%> appointed <S%H5975><s%> prophets <S%H5030><s%> to proclaim <S%H7121><s%> in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> you, 'A king <S%H4428><s%> is in Judah! <S%H3063><s%>' And now <S%H6258><s%> it will be reported <S%H8085><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> according to these <S%H428><s%> reports. <S%H1697><s%> So come <S%H1980><s%> now, <S%H6258><s%> let us take <S%H3289><s%> counsel <S%H3289><s%> together. <S%H9191><s%>"

Then I sent <S%H7971><s%> [a message] to him saying, <S%H559><s%> "Such <S%H428><s%> things <S%H1697><s%> as you are saying <S%H559><s%> have not been <S%H1961><s%> done, <S%H1961><s%> but you are inventing <S%H908><s%> them in your own mind. <S%H3820><s%>"

For all <S%H3605><s%> of them were [trying] to frighten <S%H3372><s%> us, thinking, <S%H559><s%> "They will become <S%H3027><s%> <S%H7503><s%> discouraged <S%H7503><s%> <S%H3027><s%> with the work <S%H4399><s%> and it will not be done. <S%H6213><s%>" But now, <S%H6258><s%> [O God,] strengthen <S%H2388><s%> my hands. <S%H3027><s%>

And when I entered <S%H935><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Delaiah, <S%H1806><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> of Mehetabel, <S%H4105><s%> who <S%H1931><s%> was confined <S%H6113><s%> at home, he said, <S%H559><s%> "Let us meet <S%H3259><s%> together <S%H3259><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> within <S%H8432><s%> the temple, <S%H1964><s%> and let us close <S%H5462><s%> the doors <S%H1817><s%> of the temple, <S%H1964><s%> for they are coming <S%H935><s%> to kill <S%H2026><s%> you, and they are coming <S%H935><s%> to kill <S%H2026><s%> you at night. <S%H3915><s%>"

But I said, <S%H559><s%> "Should a man <S%H376><s%> like <S%H3644><s%> me flee <S%H1272><s%>? And could one such <S%H3644><s%> as I go <S%H935><s%> into the temple <S%H1964><s%> to save <S%H2421><s%> his life <S%H2421><s%>? I will not go <S%H935><s%> in."

Then I perceived <S%H5234><s%> that surely <S%H2009><s%> God <S%H430><s%> had not sent <S%H7971><s%> him, but he uttered <S%H1696><s%> [his] prophecy <S%H5016><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> me because Tobiah <S%H2900><s%> and Sanballat <S%H5571><s%> had hired <S%H7936><s%> him.

He was hired <S%H7936><s%> for this <S%H4616><s%> reason, <S%H4616><s%> that I might become <S%H3372><s%> frightened <S%H3372><s%> and act <S%H6213><s%> accordingly <S%H3651><s%> and sin, <S%H2398><s%> so that they might have <S%H1961><s%> an evil <S%H7451><s%> report <S%H8034><s%> in order <S%H4616><s%> that they could reproach <S%H2778><s%> me.

Remember, <S%H2142><s%> O my God, <S%H430><s%> Tobiah <S%H2900><s%> and Sanballat <S%H5571><s%> according to these <S%H428><s%> works <S%H4639><s%> of theirs, and also <S%H1571><s%> Noadiah <S%H5129><s%> the prophetess <S%H5031><s%> and the rest <S%H3499><s%> of the prophets <S%H5030><s%> who <S%H834><s%> were [trying] to frighten <S%H3372><s%> me.
So the wall <S%H2346><s%> was completed <S%H9608><s%> on the twenty-fifth of [the month] Elul, <S%H435><s%> in fifty-two days. <S%H3117><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about when <S%H9201><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> our enemies <S%H340><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> [of it,] and all <S%H3605><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> surrounding <S%H5439><s%> us saw <S%H7200><s%> [it,] they lost <S%H5307><s%> their confidence; <S%H5869><s%> for they recognized <S%H3045><s%> that this <S%H384><s%> work <S%H4399><s%> had been accomplished <S%H6213><s%> with the help <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> of our God. <S%H430><s%>

Also <S%H1571><s%> in those <S%H1992><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> many <S%H7235><s%> letters <S%H107><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> from the nobles <S%H2715><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> to Tobiah, <S%H2900><s%> and Tobiah's [letters] came <S%H935><s%> to them.

For many <S%H7227><s%> in Judah <S%H3063><s%> were bound <S%H1167><s%> by oath <S%H7621><s%> to him because <S%H3588><s%> he was the son-in-law <S%H1121><s%> of Shecaniah <S%H7935><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Arah, <S%H733><s%> and his son <S%H1121><s%> Jehohanan <S%H3076><s%> had married <S%H3947><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Meshullam <S%H4918><s%> the son of Berechiah. <S%H1296><s%>

Moreover, <S%H1571><s%> they were speaking <S%H559><s%> about his good <S%H9186><s%> deeds <S%H9186><s%> in my presence <S%H6440><s%> and reported <S%H3318><s%> my words <S%H1697><s%> to him. Then Tobiah <S%H2900><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> letters <S%H107><s%> to frighten <S%H3372><s%> me.
